title: Hasan Minaj and Pardison Interview and More
itunes:title: Hasan Minaj and Pardison Interview and More
description:
Today on the show The Breakfast Club was back to their shenanigans after only getting a few hours rest from their annual Change for Change radio thon, where they raised money for Thurgood Marshall College Fund for HBCU's. Moreover, today we had comedian Hasan Minaj stop in and spoke about mental health, global censorship and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to yet another Florida man and we also had Pardison stop by to promote his new album.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
